alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 31 at 2:34PM ADT until August 31 at 4:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Bayamon County in Puerto Rico... Catano County in Puerto Rico... Guaynabo County in Puerto Rico... San Juan County in Puerto Rico... Trujillo Alto County in Puerto Rico... * Until 330 PM AST. * At 134 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen, with highest located over San Juan and Guaynabo municipalities. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, particularly in flood prone areas over San Juan and Guaynabo. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
